Trade/Device Name(s): cobas® HCV for use on the cobas® 5800/6800/8800 Systems
Regulation Name(s): ASSAY, HYBRIDIZATION AND/OR NUCLEIC ACID AMPLIFICATION FOR DETECTION OF HEPATITIS C RNA, HEPATITIS C VIRUS
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas® HCV nucleic acid amplification assay for quantitative detection of hepatitis C virus RNA on cobas® 5800/6800/8800 Systems.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative nucleic acid test for detection and management of HCV RNA (genotypes 1-6) in EDTA plasma or serum from antibody-positive or HCV-infected individuals, aiding diagnosis and monitoring antiviral therapy response; not for blood donor screening.
